Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 5 from any)
Changeling Heritage: Has the changeling trait and can take changeling ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +19 (wisdom; master)

Assurance (Athletics): Can take an automatic 24 on Athletics checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one

Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 26 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Longbow (+18 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; expert); Maul (+16 1d12+2 B; strength; expert); Spirit Thresher (+16 1d12+2 B/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Spears): Attack Master (Simple Spears; Martial Spears)/Attack Expert (Advanced Spears)
Mauler Dedication: Weapon Familiarity (Two-Handed Weapons)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Temple Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Temple Sword)
Avalanche Strike: (3) Uses a two-handed melee weapon to make a melee Strike at the current multiple attack penalty vs. each foe within reach
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for initiative
Brutal Finish: (1) Ends the turn with a two-handed melee Strike that inflicts 1 additional damage die, even on failure
Clear The Way: (2) Attempts to Shove up to 5 adjacent creatures at the current multiple attack penalty, then Strides up to 12', triggering no reactions from those successfully Shoved
Combat Flexibility: Gains 1 chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level during daily prep
Crashing Slam: Slam Down automatically inflicts a critical Trip, and using a two-handed weapon causes the Trip to inflict damage based on the weapon damage die size
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Hammer Quake: (3) Uses a non-finesse, two-handed melee weapon to make a Trip attempt vs. all foes in or adjacent to a square within reach after optionally Striking a foe in the target square; counts as 3 attacks for the multiple attack penalty
Mauler Dedication: Critical hits with a two-handed weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Shoving Sweep: (R) Uses a two-handed weapon to Shove a foe making the triggering move; critical success stops the move
Slam Down: (2) Follows a successful melee Strike with an Athletics check to Trip at the same multiple attack penalty
Unbalancing Sweep: (3) Makes a Shove or Trip attempt vs. 3 foes within reach
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 2 extra damage dice and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Battle Hardened: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Battle Hardened: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Notes
Validation Errors:
Avalanche Strike Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 16 and mauler dedication feature (currently 1)
Brutal Finish Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12 and fighter level (currently 10) >= 12 or mauler dedication level (currently 10) >= 14
Class Feats Allocation: 6 available vs. 10 allocated
Hammer Quake Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 14 and mauler dedication feature (currently 1)
Unbalancing Sweep Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 12 and barbarian level >= 12 or mauler dedication level (currently 10) >= 14
